choices.C: The neighbor's advertised distance must be greater than the feasible distance of the current successor.
choices.A: The neighbor's advertised distance must be less than or equal to the feasible distance of the current successor.
choices.B: The neighbor's advertised distance must be less than the feasible distance of the current successor.

questions.answer_ET: D. The neighbor's advertised distance must be equal to the feasible distance of the current successor.
questions.question_text: Which condition must be satisfied before an EIGRP neighbor can be considered a feasible successor?

discussion.content: B. The neighbor's advertised distance must be less than the feasible distance of the current successor.

questions.answer: D. The neighbor's advertised distance must be equal to the feasible distance of the current successor.
questions.answer_description:
The feasible successor route is a route which has a higher metric than the successor route to reach a subnet but meets the feasibility condition and can be used in the event that the successor route goes down. This route does NOT get installed in the routing table but is kept in the topology table. The feasibility condition states that the AD from a neighbor must be less than the metric of the successor route (the feasible distance [FD]) because routing through a feasible successor when the AD > FD may cause a routing loop.
Updated Question

questions.question_text: Your network consists of a large hub-and-spoke Frame Relay network with a CIR of 56 kb/s for each spoke. Which statement about the selection of a dynamic protocol is true?
questions.answer_ET: D. EIGRP would be appropriate, because you can manage how much bandwidth is consumed over the Frame Relay interface.
questions.answer: D. EIGRP would be appropriate, because you can manage how much bandwidth is consumed over the Frame Relay interface.
questions.answer_description: By default, EIGRP will limit itself to using no more than 50% of the interface bandwidth. The primary benefit of controlling EIGRPs bandwidth usage is to avoid losing EIGRP packets, which could occur when EIGRP generates data faster than the interface line can absorb it. This is of particular benefit on Frame Relay networks, where the access interface bandwidth and the PVC capacity may be very different.

choices.C: EIGRP would be appropriate, because by default, queries are not propagated across the slow speed Frame Relay links.
choices.B: EIGRP would be appropriate, because the Frame Relay spokes could be segmented into their own areas.
choices.A: EIGRP would be appropriate if LMI type ANSI is NOT used.

discussion.content: D. EIGRP would be appropriate, because you can manage how much bandwidth is consumed over the Frame Relay interface.

questions.answer: D. The subnet keyword on the border router in the redistribute EIGRP command.

choices.A: The border router is using a proper seed metric for EIGRP.
choices.B: The administrative distance is set for OSPF and EIGRP.
choices.C: The missing EIGRP routes are present in the routing table of the border router.

questions.answer_ET: D. The subnet keyword on the border router in the redistribute EIGRP command.
questions.question_text:
You have implemented mutual route redistribution between OSPF and EIGRP on a border router. When checking the routing table on one of the OSPF routers within the OSPF routing domain, you are seeing some, but not all of the expected routes.
Which two things should you verify to troubleshoot this problem? (Choose two.)
Which of the below mentioned conditions form a neighbor relationship in EIGRP? (Choose three)

questions.answer_ET: D. The OSPF network is not configured correctly.

discussion.content: B. The crypto ACL is not configured correctly.

The access-list must also support GRE traffic with the “access-list 102 permit gre host 192.168.1.1 host 192.168.2.1” command -> B is correct.
Reference:
https://www.digitaltut.com/ipsec-and-gre (Question 7.)

questions.answer: D. The OSPF network is not configured correctly.

choices.C: The crypto map is not applied to the correct interface.
choices.A: The crypto map is not configured correctly.
choices.B: The crypto ACL is not configured correctly.
